#summary This page describes use cases of tSmooks component.

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />


= Introduction =

*TSmooks* is a component, which provide [http://smooks.org Smooks] capabilities into [http://talend.com Talend]. You can find different possible use cases of *tSmooks* component on this page.


= Details =

==EDI-to-XML==
*Description*<br>
We can use *tSmooks* to perform data transformation from EDI-message format to XML.<br>
*Necessary resources:*<br>
milyn-edisax-parser-1.2.2.jar<br>
milyn-smooks-edi-1.2.2.jar<br>
